item.title: Worklog Week 9
item.description:
⚠️ Note: The following information is for reference purposes only. Please do not copy verbatim for your own report, including this warning.

Week 9 Objectives:

  • Connect and get acquainted with members of First Cloud Journey.
  • Understand basic AWS services, how to use the console & CLI.

Tasks to be carried out this week:

Day Task Start Date Completion Date Reference Material
2 - Get acquainted with FCJ members
- Read and take note of internship unit rules and regulations		 08/11/2025 08/11/2025
3 - Learn about AWS and its types of services
  + Compute
  + Storage
  + Networking
  + Database
  + …
08/12/2025 08/12/2025 https://cloudjourney.awsstudygroup.com/
4 - Create AWS Free Tier account
- Learn about AWS Console & AWS CLI
- Practice:
  + Create AWS account
  + Install & configure AWS CLI
  + How to use AWS CLI		 08/13/2025 08/13/2025 https://cloudjourney.awsstudygroup.com/
5 - Learn basic EC2:
  + Instance types
  + AMI
  + EBS
  + …
- SSH connection methods to EC2
- Learn about Elastic IP
08/14/2025 08/15/2025 https://cloudjourney.awsstudygroup.com/
6 - Practice:
  + Launch an EC2 instance
  + Connect via SSH
  + Attach an EBS volume		 08/15/2025 08/15/2025 https://cloudjourney.awsstudygroup.com/

Week 9 Achievements:

  • Understood what AWS is and mastered the basic service groups:

item.title: Worklog Week 1
item.description:
Week 1 Objectives:

  • Create an AWS account
  • Module 1: Lab 1, Lab 7, Lab 9
  • Module 2: Lab 3

Tasks to be carried out this week:

Day Task Start Date End Date Resources
2 Task: Watch Module 01 (01-07) on AWS Study Group YouTube
Practice:
  + What is cloud computing?
  + What makes AWS different?
  + How to start the cloud journey
  + AWS global infrastructure
  + AWS service management tools
  + Cost optimization on AWS and working with AWS Support
  + Additional practice and study		 11/08/2025 11/08/2025
3 Task: Watch and practice Module 01 - Lab 01 on AWS Study Group YouTube
Practice:
  + Create an AWS account
  + Set up a Virtual MFA Device
  + Create admin group and admin user
  + Account authentication support		 12/08/2025 12/08/2025 https://000001.awsstudygroup.com/vi/
4 Task: Watch and practice Module 01 - Lab 07: 01-06 on AWS Study Group YouTube
Practice:
  + Module 01-Lab07-01 -> Lab07-06: BASIC PRACTICE
  + Module 01-Lab09-01 -> Lab09-04: AWS support Packages		 13/08/2025 13/08/2025 https://000007.awsstudygroup.com/vi/
5 Task: Watch module 02-01, module 02-02 and module 02-03 on AWS Study Group YouTube
Practice: Learn about
  + AWS Virtual Private Cloud (VPC)		 14/08/2025 15/08/2025 https://000003.awsstudygroup.com/vi/2-firewallinvpc/
6 Task: Watch module 02-01, module 02-02 and module 02-03 on AWS Study Group YouTube
Practice: Learn about
  + VPC Peering & Transit Gateway
  + VPN & DirectConnect
  + Elastic Load Balancing		 15/08/2025 15/08/2025 https://000003.awsstudygroup.com/vi/5-vpnsitetosite//

Week 1 Results:

Completed:

item.title: Worklog Week 3
item.description:
Week 3 Objectives:

  • Module 03: Lab 13, Lab 24, Lab 57

    • Create a backup plan to automate system backups.
    • Perform backup/restore testing.
    • Test notifications after process completion.

  • Module 04: Theory

    • Amazon Simple Storage Service (S3)
    • Snow Family
    • Amazon Storage Gateway
    • Disaster Recovery on AWS
    • AWS Backup

Tasks to be carried out this week:

Day Task Start Date End Date Resources
2 Task: Watch and practice Module 03 - Lab 13 on AWS Study Group YouTube
Practice:
  + Module03 - Lab13: Use AWS Backup to create a backup plan for active AWS resources.		 25/08/2025 25/08/2025 https://000013.awsstudygroup.com/vi/1-introduce/
3 Task: Watch and practice Module 03 - Lab 24 on AWS Study Group YouTube
Practice:
  + Module03 - Lab24: S3 bucket and create an EC2 instance using AMI Storage Gateway.		 26/08/2025 26/08/2025 https://000024.awsstudygroup.com/vi/1-prepare/
4 Task: Watch and practice Module 03 - Lab 57 on AWS Study Group YouTube
Practice:
  + Module03 - Lab57: Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3)		 27/08/2025 27/08/2025 https://000057.awsstudygroup.com/vi/1-introduce/
5 Task: Study Module 04: 01 -> 04 theory on AWS Study Group YouTube
Practice:
  Module 04 theory: Amazon Simple Storage Service (S3)
  + Snow Family
  + Amazon Storage Gateway
  + Disaster Recovery on AWS
  + AWS Backup		 28/08/2025 28/08/2025 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hsCfP0IxoaM&list=PLahN4TLWtox2a3vElknwzU_urND8hLn1i&index=103
6 Task: Watch and practice Module 04 - Lab 13 on AWS Study Group YouTube
Practice:
  + Module04 - Lab13: Use AWS Backup to create a backup plan for active resources		 29/08/2025 29/08/2025 https://000013.awsstudygroup.com/vi/3-createbackupplan/

Week 3 Results:

  • AWS Backup

item.title: Worklog Week 4
item.description:
Week 4 Objectives:

  • Practice VM Import/Export — a lab built on knowledge from previous labs. To complete this lab you need AWS CLI installed and a virtualization environment (e.g., VMware Workstation).

  • Prepare the workshop environment, including creating an S3 bucket and launching an EC2 instance using the AMI Storage Gateway provided by AWS.

  • Amazon S3.

  • Theory:

    • Shared Responsibility Model
    • AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM)
    • Amazon Cognito
    • AWS Organizations
    • AWS Identity Center
    • AWS Key Management Service (KMS)
    • AWS Security Hub

  • Module 04

item.title: Worklog Week 5
item.description:
Week 5 Objectives:

  • To help manage virtual machines, volumes and other EC2 resources, Lab 27 will practice assigning metadata to each resource as Tags and using Resource Groups.
  • IAM least privilege
  • IAM policy specification with conditions
  • Learn about IAM Permission Boundaries.
  • Learn about AWS Key Management Service (KMS), Amazon S3, AWS CloudTrail, AWS Athena.
  • Review IAM concepts, create Users/Groups, Roles.
  • Grant application access so it can access AWS services.
  • Module 05
  • Module 06

Tasks to be carried out this week:

Day Task Start Date End Date Resources
2 Task: Watch and practice Module 05 - Lab 27 and Lab 28 on AWS Study Group YouTube
Practice:
  + Module05-LAB 27: Manage resources using Tags and Resource Groups
  + Module05-LAB 28: Manage access to EC2 resources using Resource Tags with AWS IAM.		 06/10/2025 06/10/2025 https://000027.awsstudygroup.com/vi/0-intro/ https://000028.awsstudygroup.com/vi/0-intro/
3 Task: Watch and practice Module 05 - Lab 30 and Lab 33 on AWS Study Group YouTube
Practice:
  + Module05-LAB 30: LIMIT USER PERMISSIONS WITH IAM PERMISSION BOUNDARY
  + Module05-LAB 33:
  + AWS Key Management Service (KMS)
  + Amazon S3
  + AWS CloudTrail
  + AWS Athena		 07/10/2025 07/10/2025 https://000033.awsstudygroup.com/vi/1-introduce/ https://000030.awsstudygroup.com/vi/1-introduce/
4 Task: Watch and practice Module 05 - Lab 44 and Lab 48 on AWS Study Group YouTube
Practice:
  + Module05-LAB 44: IAM (User/Group, Role)
  + Module05-LAB 48: Grant application access to AWS services using IAM Role		 08/10/2025 08/10/2025 https://000044.awsstudygroup.com/vi/1-iam-intro/ https://000048.awsstudygroup.com/vi/
5 Task: Watch and practice Module 06 - Lab 05 on AWS Study Group YouTube
Practice:
  Theory:
  + Database Concepts
  + Amazon RDS
  + Amazon Aurora
  + Amazon ElastiCache
  + Amazon Redshift		 09/10/2025 09/10/2025 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OOD2RwWuLRw&list=PLahN4TLWtox2a3vElknwzU_urND8hLn1i&index=217
6 Task: Watch and practice Module 06 - Lab 05 on AWS Study Group YouTube
Practice:
  + Module06-LAB 05: Amazon Relational Database Service (Amazon RDS)		 10/10/2025 10/10/2025 https://000005.awsstudygroup.com/vi/

Week 5 Results:

  • Assigned metadata to each resource as Tags and used Resource Groups.

item.title: Worklog Week 6
item.description:
Week 6 Objectives:

  • Use AWS Glue as the data catalog. Use Amazon Athena to query data in the data lake and Amazon QuickSight for visualization.
  • Learn about Amazon DynamoDB.
  • Learn AWS Glue & Amazon Athena.
  • Analytics on AWS workshop.
  • Module 07

Tasks to be carried out this week:

Day Task Start Date End Date Resources
2 Task: Watch and practice Module 07 - Lab 35 on AWS Study Group YouTube
Practice:
  + Module07-LAB 35: DataLake on AWS		 13/10/2025 13/10/2025 https://000035.awsstudygroup.com/vi/1-introduce/
3 Task: Watch and practice Module 07 - Lab 39 on AWS Study Group YouTube
Practice:
  + Module07-LAB 39: Amazon DynamoDB Immersion Day		 14/10/2025 14/10/2025 https://000039.awsstudygroup.com/vi/
4 Task: Watch and practice Module 07 - Lab 40 on AWS Study Group YouTube
Practice:
  + Module07-LAB 40: AWS Glue & Amazon Athena		 15/10/2025 15/10/2025 https://000040.awsstudygroup.com/vi/
5 Task: Watch and practice Module 07 - Lab 60 on AWS Study Group YouTube
Practice:
  + Module07-LAB 60: Working with Amazon DynamoDB		 16/10/2025 16/10/2025 https://000060.awsstudygroup.com/vi/1-using-tags
6 Task: Watch and practice Module 07 - Lab 72 on AWS Study Group YouTube
Practice:
  + Module07-LAB 72: Analytics on AWS workshop		 17/10/2025 17/10/2025 https://000072.awsstudygroup.com/vi/1-using-tags

Week 6 Results:

A Data Lake is a concept related to Big Data. A Data Lake is simply a repository that stores raw (unprocessed) data waiting to be processed, analyzed and turned into insights.

item.description:
Week 7 Objectives:

  • Learn how to deploy the TravelBuddy web application on AWS.

item.title: Worklog Week 8
item.description:
Week 8 Objectives:

  • Prepare and provision resources for the workshop.

Learn about:

  • Core concepts of Serverless Computing
  • Building a Lambda function triggered by S3 events
  • Interacting with and storing data in DynamoDB via Lambda

Tasks to be carried out this week:

Day Task Start Date End Date Resources

  + Download Hugo Theme
  + Install Snagit
  + Install Active Presenter
  + Install Draw.io		 27/10/2025 27/10/2025 https://van-hoang-kha.github.io/1-introduce/

Practice:
  Review Week 5 materials on the AWS Special Force Portal (more complete on YouTube).		 28/10/2025 28/10/2025
4 Task: Review Week 6 theory: Observability & Cost Management
Practice:
  Review Week 6 materials on the AWS Special Force Portal (more complete on YouTube).		 29/10/2025 29/10/2025

Practice:
